DOC.brief_summary: This 3-arm randomized control trial test efficacy three novel motivational approach weight loss 18-25 year old . Participants 18-25 year old BMI 25-45 kg/m2 , randomize : 1 ) Behavioral Weight Loss ( BWL ) , 2 ) BWL + Autonomous Motivation ( BWL+Aut ) 3 ) BWL + Extrinsic Motivation ( BWL+Ext ) . All arm receive 6-month behavioral weight loss intervention , follow 6-month no-treatment follow period .
DOC.brief_title: Low Intensity Weight Loss Young Adults
DOC.detailed_description: A 3-arm randomized control trial conduct , goal determine group represent viable approach behavioral weight loss treatment 18-25 year old . A total 381 participants,18-25 year age , BMI 25 45 kg/m2 randomize one three group : 1 ) Behavioral Weight Loss ( BWL ) , 2 ) BWL + Autonomous Motivation ( BWL+Aut ) 3 ) BWL + Extrinsic Motivation ( BWL+Ext ) . All arm receive 24-week behavioral weight loss intervention , include personalize dietary , physical activity , weight loss prescription . In addition , arm follow 6 month treatment follow-up period . Assessments weight secondary outcome occur 0 , 3 , 6 12 month . The investigator compare treatment effect , across 3 arm 6 month , compare arm weight loss maintenance at12 month . The investigator also examine mediator treatment outcomes consistent investigator theoretical framework .

Report uncontrolled medical condition may pose safety issue give recommendation diet unsupervised physical activity current study ( e.g. , uncontrolled hypertension ) . The investigator refer individual blood pressure level > 140 / 90 mmHg part baseline screen physician exclude study unless treat physician determines s/he suitable candidate base specific protocol provide write medical consent participation . Participants report history current treatment medical condition ( e.g. , hypertension , diabetes ) ask obtain MD consent participate . Other health problem medication may influence ability walk physical activity associate unintentional weight change , include cancer treatment within past 5 year tuberculosis . Report heart condition , chest pain period activity rest , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) , administer prescreen . Individuals endorse joint problem , prescription medication usage , medical condition could limit exercise require obtain write physician consent participate . Report history , current diagnosis anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa , current compensatory behavior ( e.g. , vomit , laxative use , excessive exercise ) . Current symptom alcohol substance dependence . Planning move area within study period . Currently pregnant , pregnant within past 6 month , currently breastfeed plan become pregnant within next 12 month . Hospitalization depression psychiatric disorder within past 12 month . History psychotic disorder bipolar disorder . Another member household participant staff member study . Participation another research study may interfere study . Currently participate weight loss program and/or take weight loss medication lose > 5 % body weight past 3 month . Failure complete screening appointment .
